_header: The Kings banner began to spread
Subjects: hymns, to Christ; Christ, hymns to; translations
_description: Vexilla regis prodeunt — four rhyming lines

OxfMert248.Transcription:
þe kinges baner bigan to spredeOn þe crouch sewynde stynys
                    vs spedeWech fesh of flesh makere of medeit heng on rode for oure
                    misdede
